hiveArticle.title: Happy Holi to All
hiveArticle.body:
Holi is a Hindu Festival mainly celebrated in India, is a festival of Color, Togetherness, Peace, Harmony, Friendship etc. Mainly it is a festival of victory of good over evil. 

In the occasion of Holi we had a small party in our office with drinks and snacks.

### Few Beers

![IMG_20180302_173008.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQma81yuRyRGHy2TMJjEK4WRg4RwHH21Fjm2tJS62LZZSLh/IMG_20180302_173008.jpg)
